H0.text: Having risen in Plynlimmon, which is the only English city through which the River Wye flows. Ross-on-Wye

H1.text: Having risen in Plynlimmon, which is the only English city through which the River Wye flows. Gloucester

H2.text: Having risen in Plynlimmon, which is the only English city through which the River Wye flows. Worcester

H3.text: Having risen in Plynlimmon, which is the only English city through which the River Wye flows. HEREFORD

A4.text: It is on the banks of the River Wye
